public interface RoomClient

      @GetMapping("/regular-rooms/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) RegularRoom findRegularRoomById​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Integer roomId)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • updateRegularRoomAvailability

      @PatchMapping("/update-regular-rooms/{id}/{availability}") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) void updateRegularRoomAvailability​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Integer roomId, @PathVariable("availability") java.lang.Boolean availability)
      Update Regular Room Availability
      Parameters:
      roomId - receives an Integer with roomId
      availability - receives a Boolean with availability

      Returns:

      @PatchMapping("/update-suites/{id}/{availability}") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) void updateSuiteAvailability​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Integer roomId, @PathVariable("availability") java.lang.Boolean availability)
      Update Suite Availability
      Parameters:
      roomId - receives an Integer with roomId
      availability - receives a Boolean with availability

    • createSuite

      @PostMapping("/suites") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) SuiteRoom createSuite​(@RequestBody SuiteRoom suite)
      Creates a Suite

      Returns:
      a SuiteRoom created
